title: Sniper Elite 4: Deluxe Edition – v1.5.0 + All DLCs + Multiplayer + Dedicated Server
body:
Sniper Elite 4: Deluxe Edition – v1.5.0 + All DLCs + Multiplayer + Dedicated Server


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Company: Rebellion Developments
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 63.9 GB
Repack Size: from 24.3 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only] MULTi10
  • RuTor [magnet] ENG/RUS
  • FreeTorrents ENG/RUS
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] ENG/RUS
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2] MULTi10

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on SNIPER.ELITE.4.DELUXE.EDITION.V1.5.0-STEAMPUNKS & SNIPER.ELITE.4.DEDICATED.SERVER.V1.5.0-STEAMPUNKS ISO releases: stp-se4v150.iso (56,068,876,288 bytes) & stp-se4v150ds.iso (12,495,489,024 bytes)
  • All released DLCs included and activated
  • Sniper Elite 4 Language Selector V1 (SE4LS) by Sorrow included
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of Multiplayer/Dedicated Server files and languages you don’t need (English/Polish and both Chineses included by default)
  • ATTENTION! Solo Survivor SP mode requires MP files installed, so consider this when deciding (not) to download those files
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 63.9 to 24.3~26.5 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 40-60 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 67 GB (~67 GB during installation)
  • Use “Language Changer.bat” in game root to change the game language if you installed the game in non-English and want to play in English
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Discover unrivalled sniping freedom in the largest and most advanced World War 2 shooter ever built. Experience tactical third-person combat, gameplay choice and epic longshots across gigantic levels as you liberate wartime Italy from the grip of Fascism.

Set in the aftermath of its award-winning predecessor, Sniper Elite 4 transports players across the beautiful Italian peninsula, from sun-drenched Mediterranean coastal towns, to ancient forests, mountain valleys and colossal Nazi megastructures.

Covert agent and elite marksman Karl Fairburne must fight alongside the brave men and women of the Italian Resistance and defeat a terrifying new threat with the potential to halt the Allied fightback in Europe before it’s even begun.

Included DLCs

  • Allied Forces Rifle Pack
  • Camouflage Rifles Skin Pack
  • Cold Warfare Winter Expansion Pack
  • Covert Heroes Character Pack
  • Deathstorm Part 1: Inception
  • Deathstorm Part 2: Infiltration
  • Deathstorm Part 3: Obliteration
  • Lock and Load Weapons Pack
  • Night Fighter Expansion Pack
  • Silent Warfare Weapons Pack
  • Target Fuhrer
  • Urban Assault Expansion Pack

You can skip downloading of files you don’t need (English/Polish/Simplified Chinese/Traditional Chinese included in base installation). Here is the list of such files:

  • setup-fitgirl-optional-multiplayer.bin (includes both client and dedicated server files, also required for Sole Survivor SP mode)
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-brazilian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-french.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-italian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-russian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwatds compatible with my previous SE4 repack, too many files have been changed and added.
